Description:
Picture Perfect, Warm & Welcoming
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
Beyond its striking facade, the home's beautifully appointed interior boasts a large master bedroom fitted with walk in robe & deluxe ensuite, three additional good size bedrooms, stunning main bathroom and the perfect formal lounge.
Other luxuries include kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Caesar stone benches, dishwasher & walk in pantry overlooking the dining/living room, heating & cooling, alarm system, downlight throughout, high ceilings, double car garage with internal access, immaculately landscaped front and rear gardens and the picture perfect undercover alfresco perfect for all family occasions.
An aspirational family lifestyle located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & premium streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, Stockland shopping centre, public transport and local schools. This home really is the complete package, be quick to inspect as it won't hang around for long!
Insights: 18 Flannery Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy on 650m2!
If you are looking for that perfect first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go.
Just a few of the features on hand include a well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher, adjoining meals/family room, separate formal lounge, gas heating plus a woodfire coonara & evaporative cooling, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, main bathroom, security alarm, electric window roller shutters, ducted vaccum, new carpet, under-cover car accommodation for up to five cars plus an additional 3 car spaces in the drive way providing you with endless options as far as storage for the boat, extra cars, caravan or trailer with drive-thru access and much more.
All set on a very large allotment of 650m2 (approximately), whatever your requirements may be this property offers endless opportunities. Ideally located right in the heart of Craigieburn within close distance to the Craigieburn train station, shopping plaza, schools and shops. Don't let this opportunity pass you by. This one won't hang around for long. Call now for inspection...
Insights: 2 Ramsbury Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Stunning and Inspiring Home!!!
This attractive home nestled in a quiet location is sure to end your search for that new home. Well-presented, maintained and ready to move in and enjoy now with unique modern living with plenty of space to entertain both indoors and outdoors alike.
Offering 5 good size bedrooms with built in robes (2 bedroom with ensuite), 2 spacious family rooms, Rumpus room, a spacious kitchen overlooking meals area, 3 bathrooms, secure double garage, Decked pergola and a great size back garden, Balcony.
Other Features: Ducted heating, split system, intercom and much much more….
Close to schools, shopping center, medical centers and the local bus. Easy access to freeway & Ring road. Don’t miss out
Land Size: 680m2.

Description:
Family Excellence & Outdoor Space on 722m2 (approx)
Cleverly designed to take full advantage of its generous sized allotment (722m2 approx), this 4 bedroom single-level gem presents an aspirational family lifestyle with its wonderfully versatile floor-plan, quality features throughout & prime position just a leisurely walk to Brickwood Park.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's inviting interior comprises of a spacious master bedroom with walk-in wardrobe and opulent double vanity en-suite, 3 additional bedrooms with WIR's, spotless central bathroom and powder-room. Sun-drenched dual living zones include a separate theater room & spacious open-plan family/dining area complemented by a gourmet stone-bench kitchen complete with 900mm stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher, an abundance of bench space, impressive walk in pantry and roomy laundry with plenty of storage. Add to this stacker doors that lead out to an all-weather alfresco entertaining deck & set amidst a large rear landscaped yard to entertain family and friends while the kids play to their heart's content in the safety of their own private space.
High ceilings and doors throughout further add to the home's appeal along with open study or optional lounge, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, alarm system, stone benches in all wet area's, spotted gum flooring plus remote-control double garage with internal access and so much more. Located to perfection close to Malcolm Creek trails, public transport, popular primary & secondary schools as well as a choice of shopping centres.
Settlement: 30, 45, 60 days
Contact: Domenic Campisi - 0412 777 372
https://www.facebook.com/domeniccampisirealestate/
Contact Phillip Mercieca - 0402 419 827
Insights: 30 Kelway Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
No better place to call home
This charming home is set on a very generous allotment of 648m2 (approx.) and positioned perfectly within walking distance to schools, shopping centres, park land and transport, sporting grounds and much more!
Offering three spacious bedrooms, central bathroom, well appointed kitchen adjoining meals area and spacious family area. A lovely addition is the massive sun room, or second living zone. Step outside to an undercover area for all year round entertainment overlooking the huge backyard. and free standing lock up garage. Enjoy this well looked after family home that has plenty to offer for the growing family.
Other features include; ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, split system, shed, ample off street parking and much more.

Description:
Impeccable Location with Picture-Perfect Surrounds
Positioned to perfection in a family-focused neighbourhood with Malcolm Creek trails & parkland at the end of the street, this freestanding home is set to impress with its free-flowing design & long list of features.
The home's inviting interior comprises 3 bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & private ensuite), main bathroom with stone-top vanity & separate WC. Add to this a dedicated large formal lounge & open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen complete stainless steel appliances & ample cupboard space.
Other highlights include ducted heating & reverse cycle cooling, full-size laundry & internally-accessed garage (remote-controlled). Also walking distance to local buses & Parkview Wildflower Reserve, close to primary & secondary schools, Kindergarten/childcare, as well as easy access to shopping centres & the freeway.

Description:
COMPLETE PERFECTION
This first class, impeccable residence offers a cosmopolitan lifestyle to eclipse all others. Polished to perfection, five star living awaits!
This contemporary masterpiece together with the decor maximises the stunning outlook of this home with a welcoming entry that flows through to the heart of the home where you can't help but be drawn to the open plan living, enhanced with striking Tasmanian Oak hardwood floors and 9 foot ceilings...a testament to clever design and appreciation of quality.
The floor plan is generous, offering 4 bedrooms, a palatial ensuite to master room with large shower and tailored walk in robe.
Custom made, executive study, delivering high quality workmanship or convert to a 5th bedroom if needed.
A glamorous 2-Pack kitchen, showcasing a grand Caesar Stone breakfast bar/bench centrepiece, an enviable large butler's pantry, top shelf Smeg 900mm cooktop with under bench oven, under mount sink, cushion cabinetry, glass splash backs and integrated dishwasher with an abundance of bench and cupboard space.
Family area is ideally outfitted with an ambient gas fireplace and beautified with a customised entertainment unit.
Flowing from the kitchen, through triple-sliding stacker doors, step into an elaborately completed, enclosed alfresco area, designed to entertain in style, with additional external triple stacker doors providing a seamless transition from inside to outside, thats floods the home with natural light and ventilation.
Further enhancing the home is a fully functional kitchenette to the rear of the double remote garage with useful rear roller door access.
All your desires are met with Daikin heating and refrigerated cooling system, video camera surveillance, door entry intercom and security alarm system, ducted vacuum maid, quality double blinds and low maintenance front and back gardens.
Adding to the appeal is an equally palatial central bathroom with free standing oval iStone bathtub and frameless walk in shower, separate powder room with clever wall niche plus Caesar stone, 2-Pack cupboards and white glass robes throughout the whole home.
Your local retail and food precint is well catered for with 1km to Highlands Shopping Centre, 3.5km to Craigieburn Central and easy access to Aitken Blvd, Mt Ridley Rd and Hume Fwy.
Bus route 541 is also available with just a short walk from home.
Insights: 137 Huntington Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate Home with Plenty of Space !
Positioned within close proximity to schools, Craigieburn Central, parkland, Water park & public transport, this 10 year young home that has been immaculately kept and is ready for you & your family to move straight into & enjoy.
Set on a lovely landscaped 448m2 approx. allotment, and highlighted by an open floor plan, natural light, consists of 3 great size bedrooms with BIR's, (master with large ensuite & WIR), bright central bathroom. Walk through the inviting entry and be greeted by a formal lounge/ home office, a lovely stone kitchen includes walk in pantry, stainless steel appliances with 600mm s/s appliances, dishwasher with breakfast bar bench over- looking the large open-plan meals & living room, plus a separate family room which leads out to your undercover alfresco for all your entertainment needs plus an extended paved area and grassed yard for your pets and kids to enjoy.
Features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, plantation shutters, stone tops & downlights throughout, a large double remote garage with internal access plus much more.
This beautifully presented & complete home is sure to put a smile on your family's face...be quick!
Land: Approx. 448m2
Settlement: 60 or 90 days
Price Guide: $490,000-$520,000
Contact: Malek Younan - 0411 504 016
facebook.com/malek.younan.raywhite

Description:
The Perfect Family Home
Perfectly located in the popular Highlands estate, this spacious 4 bedrooms home with its versatile floorplan suitable for everyone. Featuring a master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, three further bedrooms with built in robes, main bathroom and separate toilet, open-plan living/dining area coupled with a well-appointed kitchen featuring stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, glass splashback and ample pantry space following seamless through to an undercover alfresco perfect for entertaining. Complete with remote-control double garage (internally-accessed), ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar power.
All this within walking distance to schools, public transport and Highlands Shopping Centre. Easy access to the Craigieburn train station and major arterials Craigieburn bypass, Hume Hwy and Western Ring Rd.

Description:
Affordable Luxury With Parkland At Your Door
Offering a perfect balance of space, style and convenience, this radiant three bedroom townhouse delivers smart low maintenance living with swift access to key lifestyle assets. This impressive residence features a light and bright open-plan living area, where a central modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances with stone benches and dishwasher is flanked by an inviting living space and sun-kissed dining area, which integrates with the private and low maintenance large backyard.
A key feature of this move-straight-into residence is the intelligent zoning of both spacious bedrooms upstairs; the master complete with built in robes & ensuite with double shower and its very own balcony looking over the park, striking main bathroom and bedrooms with built in robes.
Enhancing this property's indisputable appeal is heating & cooling, a remote double garage accessed via the backyard, downstairs floor boards, three toilets and a sensational location within walking distance of Newbury Child and Community Centre, Newbury Primary School and bus services and moments to Stockland Highlands Shopping Centre.
Insights: 5 Angeline Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Sophisticated Family Home
Situated on a corner block in the prestigious Mt. Ridley Estate, opposite to a friendly parkland is this luxurious family home. Its spacious dimensions, quality fittings and fixtures are sure to impress even the fussiest of buyers.
Within walking distance to Mother Theresa Primary, Hume Anglican grammar School and Parklands; and within a short distance from everything great Craigieburn has to offer- this striking four bedroom, two bathroom home is bound to impress.
Stylish and sophisticated, it introduces an outstanding open plan living that stretches the entire width of the house. The kitchen is fit for a Master Chef including ample cupboard space, stainless steel appliance and 40 mm natural marble stones that is sure to inspire the cook in everyone.
The impressive master bedroom comes fully equipped with a WIR and a quality ensuite which includes natural stone marble benchtops. Venture through the home to the remaining 3 bedrooms which all include BIRs. Two of the bedrooms come with their own private study nook
This freshly painted family home is ready for you to move in and entertain family all year round.
Breathtaking city views from your very own private balcony is defiantly a WOW factor when shopping for your next family home.
Extras include
- Marble stone benchtops in all bathrooms
- Double garage
- Ducted heating & evaporative cooling
- New high quality taps and basins
- Smeg cooktop and range hood
......... Plus much much more!!!!!! Inspections is a must!
Sealed Bid: Monday 24/06/19 at 7.00pm
Insights: 25 Northstead Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Outstanding Family Flexibility
In a family-focused neighbourhood and located within easy reach of all amenities, this single-level home presents a ready-made lifestyle of size & versatility with its extended floor-plan & wonderfully large block of land with extra wide side drive perfect for the boat or caravan.
For buyers that appreciate space, light & functionality the home enjoys a free-flowing design which highlights 5 bedrooms with great storage (walk-in robe & ensuite to master), separate formal dining, superb kitchen with ample bench space, stainless steel appliances & walk in pantry, overlooking an adjoining meals & family area continuing seamlessly through to an extended family/rumpus area which needs to be seen to be appreciate and study or 5th bedroom.
Adding to the properties appeal is a wonderfully large rear garden, oversized pergola area perfect for entertaining, double car port with drive-thru access, fresh coat of paint, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, roomy laundry, central bathroom & so much more!
Situated to please, close to parkland, schools, shops & public transport. If family space, comfort & location are high on your agenda, then this home is a must inspect!

Description:
What a Gem!
Perfect for first home buyers, growing families or the savvy investor, comprising of 3 spacious bedrooms, master bedroom with walk in robe and full ensuite, kitchen / meals with adjoining living area, L shaped lounge and dining area, central bathroom, separate toilet, double car garage and sizeable undercover entertainment area. Features include: Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, large shed / workshop with power and cold water, manicured garden, all of this situated on a generous allotment of 563m2 (approx). Located in the heart of Craigieburn close to Schools, parks, public transport, Craigieburn Plaza, easy freeway and highway access and much much more!
Insights: 47 Emerald Circuit, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Perfection in the Heart of Fairways
Situated in a leafy Fairways streetscape with immediate access to the area's key attractions, this wonderfully spacious family home delivers a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle opportunity with its versatile floorplan, first-class features throughout & quality landscaping all-round.
Well-proportioned rooms & an abundance of natural light create an inviting interior comprising 4 generous bedrooms (large master with walk-in robe & private ensuite), stylish central bathroom & separate WCs on both levels. Multiple living zones include formal lounge & dining, retreat (upstairs) out to front balcony, open-plan family/meals area & spacious rear living room complete gas-coal fireplace.
Add to this a sensational gourmet kitchen complete with premium 65mm stone benchtops, soft-
close cabinetry & ample cupboard space, Smeg oven & dual Fisher & Paykel dish drawers.
Other highlights include ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, alarm system, quality window
furnishings, LED downlights throughout & excellent storage spaces across both levels.
Step outside to discover a large backyard with entertaining deck & extensive paving,
established gardens & three storage sheds, plus the added advantage of a remote-control
double garage with internal entry. Moments from St Andrews Drive Reserve, Fairways Lake Reserve & Fairways Boulevard buses, it's also close to Craigieburn Golf Course, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, primary & secondary schools. Very impressive!
Insights: 5 St Andrews Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect for those starting out, investing or downsizing....
Set in an ideal and sought-after location in Craigieburn, this well-presented home has a lot to offer first homebuyers, investors or those looking to downsize. With a tastefully designed exterior you will be impressed with the open plan living which includes heating & cooling, kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals/living area, large master bedroom with built in robes, main bathroom with double vanity, open study/sitting area which could easily be converted to a 3rd bedroom, high ceilings and much more. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. This home really does offer a blend of low maintenance living, without comprising on space or comfort and with all the amenities close by including shopping centres, public transport & schools. Be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!
Insights: 15 Dempster Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
